title: Harris: I'll replace hospital managers
text: Harris: I'll replace hospital managers Independent.ie Minister for Health Simon Harris is willing to replace hospital managers by bringing in outside experts as part of his new plan to resolve the trolley crisis in Irish hospitals. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/health/harris-ill-replace-hospital-managers-35349635.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35349744.ece/7fac5/AUTOCROP/h342/4%20NEWS%20II%20HARRIS%204.jpg Health Minister Simon Harris Photo: Colin O'Riordan Minister for Health Simon Harris is willing to replace hospital managers by bringing in outside experts as part of his new plan to resolve the trolley crisis in Irish hospitals.
